item.title: Network Discovery
item.description: Test connectivity Linux Windows # Default infinite pings ping -c3 <TARGET> # Default 5 pings ping <TARGET> # Check specific port Test-NetConnection <TARGET> -Port <TARGET_PORT> # With Active Directory Module Installed Get-ADComputer -Filter * | ForEach-Object { $_ | Select-Object Name, @{Name='IPAddress';Expression={(Test-Connection -ComputerName $_.Name -Count 1).IPV4Address}}} Test reverse connectivity Linux sudo tcpdump -ni tun0 icmp Sniff network traffic Linux # Sniff on network adapter sudo tcpdump -i eth0 -w packets.pcap root@NIX01:/dev/shm# sudo tcpdump -i eth0 -w packets.
